step_1_context.text: Direct: 'I am busy.' Reported: She said that she was busy.

step_2_explanation.simple_rule: Use reported speech to tell what someone said without quoting exact words.
step_2_explanation.common_mistake: Pronouns and time words usually change in reported speech.

step_3_interactive_exercises.question: Choose the correct reported sentence: Tom said, 'I can help.'
options: Tom said that I can help.
Tom said that he could help.
Tom said that he can helped.
step_3_interactive_exercises.correct_answer: Tom said that he could help.
step_3_interactive_exercises.explanation_for_failure: Backshift can to could and adjust pronoun to he.

step_3_interactive_exercises.incorrect_sentence: She said she is tired yesterday.
step_3_interactive_exercises.corrected_sentence: She said she was tired the day before.
step_3_interactive_exercises.error_analysis: Backshift and time expression changes are usually needed in past reporting.
